channel.title: Help!
channel.description: i need help with my smithing problem...it wont let me smith anything that takes more than 1 bar....even if i have 1000 bars it will say you dont have enough bars to make that or something..and it gets annoying when i have like 99 smithing and i cant make anything more than a full helm or something.... so any help will be greatly appreciated

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @xxhurleyxx xxhurleyxx
item.description:
@xxhurleyxx wrote:

ok…but how do i get to that code?

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

…

Just look through your code.
whatever you put should be like

if((playerHasItemAmount(barid, baramount)==true) 
{
actionhere;
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(barid, baramount)==false)
{
sendMessage("you dont have enough bars");
}

It should be similar to that.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!

item.description:
@xxhurleyxx wrote:

and how do i see if that is mixed up???[br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2007, 04:40:44 PM[/size][hr]Any idea???[br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2007, 04:43:21 PM[/size][hr]do you know how to check to see if i have that mixed up?

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

Check to see if you got < and > mixed up. I do that alot
